github.copilot.chat.codeGeneration.instr.text: Write clean and organized JavaScript code
Use plain HTML for structuring the website
Use Tailwind CSS for all styling and layout designs
Name variables and functions in camelCase
Use semantic HTML tags when possible (e.g., <header>, <main>, <footer>)
Avoid inline styles; use Tailwind classes instead
Prefer event delegation for handling multiple dynamic elements
Do not add comments to the code unless necessary
Use minimalist font like 'Inter' for the project
